kpi.name: sgsn_969b

kpi_info.title: Rejected Gb attach attempts due to overload noticed by the PAPU in 1st OL control point
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows number of rejected attach attempts from Gb interface due to overload noticed by the PAPU in the first overload control point.

kpi.kpi_alias: Rejected Gb attach attempts due to overload noticed by the PAPU in 1st OL control point
